Lazarus 1-3 (of 3)

[quote]Juan Ferreyra returns to Image Comics&#039; Shadowline this October with LAZARUS, a full color mystery mini-series with an undeadly twist.
James Lazarus, the titular protagonist, is plagued by dreams of his death night after night. These dreams turn out to be far from fantasy as James discovers he&#039;s truly immortal during an attempt on his life. This puts him on an urgent search to figure out who is responsible for attacking him and why. The answers don&#039;t come easy. As James learns, immortality can be quite painful.[/quote]



BIG THANKS to all the scanners involved.

IF YOU LIKE THE BOOK, THEN BUY THE COMICS OR THE TRADES. SUPPORT YOUR LOCAL COMIC BOOK STORES AND THE INDEPENDENT PUBLISHERS!!!

Please keep seeding and enjoy! :D
